title: The Serpent and the Wings of Night
author: Carissa Broadbent
description: A gripping tale of a human-vampire competition, love, and betrayal.
long_description: For humans and vampires, the rules of survival are the same: never trust, never yield, and always, always guard your heart. The adopted human daughter of the Nightborn vampire king, Oraya carved her station in a world designed to kill her. Her only chance to become something more than prey is to enter the Kejari, a legendary tournament held by the goddess of death herself. But winning will not be easy amongst the most vicious warriors from three vampire houses. To survive, Oraya is forced to make an alliance with a mysterious rival. Everything about Raihn is dangerous. He is a ruthless vampire, an efficient killer, an enemy to her father’s crown… and her greatest competition. Yet, what terrifies Oraya most of all is that she finds herself drawn to him.
author_bio: Carissa Broadbent has been concerning her family with stories of dragons, deities, and doomed romance since she was a small child. She is a graduate of the University of Massachusetts Amherst.
tagline: In the obsidian shadows, a deadly game begins.

reviews.text: Absolutely devoured this book! The tension is incredible.
A great read, though the middle was a bit slow. The ending was fantastic!

title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
author: Sarah J. Maas
description: A huntress's journey into the magical lands of the Fae to save her family.
long_description: When nineteen-year-old huntress Feyre kills a wolf in the woods, a terrifying creature arrives to demand retribution. Dragged to a treacherous magical land she knows only from legends, Feyre discovers that her captor is not an animal, but Tamlin—one of the lethal, immortal faeries who once ruled their world. As she dwells on his estate, her feelings for Tamlin transform from icy hostility into a fiery passion that burns through every lie and warning she's been told about the beautiful, dangerous world of the Fae.
author_bio: Sarah J. Maas is the #1 New York Times and internationally bestselling author of the Crescent City, Court of Thorns and Roses, and Throne of Glass series.
tagline: Love is a curse that will not be broken.

reviews.text: A modern classic. The world-building is second to none.

title: Fourth Wing
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: Violet Sorrengail must survive the brutal and elite world of a war college for dragon riders.
long_description: Twenty-year-old Violet Sorrengail was supposed to live a quiet life among books and history. Now, the commanding general—also known as her tough-as-talons mother—has ordered Violet to join the hundreds of candidates striving to become the elite of Navarre: dragon riders. But when you’re smaller than everyone else and your body is brittle, death is only a heartbeat away...because dragons don’t bond to “fragile” humans. They incinerate them.
author_bio: Rebecca Yarros is a hopeless romantic and lover of all things chocolate, coffee, and Paleo. She is the author of over fifteen novels.
tagline: Enter the world of dragons, or die trying.

reviews.text: Non-stop action and an incredible magic system. I couldn't put it down!
The hype is real. This book is everything.
